meanings.sent1: The runtier puppy was the smallest in the litter.
meanings.sent2: The runtier kittens were always picked last to play.
meanings.sent3: The runtier piglet tried to oink as loudly as the others.
meanings.sent4: The runtier flowers in the garden seemed to shy away from the sun.
meanings.sent5: The runtier apples on the tree were too sour to eat.

meanings.sent1: The runtier ducklings struggled to keep up with the group.
meanings.sent2: The runtier plants needed extra care to grow properly.
meanings.sent3: The runtier snowman melted faster in the warm sun.
meanings.sent4: The runtier clouds in the sky seemed to disappear quickly.
meanings.sent5: The runtier stars in the sky were barely visible on cloudy nights.
